channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Data Store
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Data Store

item.title: CVE-2023-42578|2024-08-02T19:23:40.156Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20data%20store
item.description: Improper handling of insufficient permissions or privileges vulnerability in Samsung Data Store prior to version 5.2.00.7 allows remote attackers to access location information without permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-20851|2024-08-01T22:06:37.166Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20data%20store
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Data Store prior to version 5.3.00.4 allows local attackers to launch arbitrary activity with Samsung Data Store privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-20851|2024-04-02T02:59:47.450Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20data%20store
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Data Store prior to version 5.3.00.4 allows local attackers to launch arbitrary activity with Samsung Data Store privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-20851|2024-07-08T20:11:22.949Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20data%20store
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Data Store prior to version 5.3.00.4 allows local attackers to launch arbitrary activity with Samsung Data Store privilege.
